item.description:
Join NHCer Richard at a Beatles Cover Band Concert!

"1964 The Tribute" has been refered to as the "Best Beatles Tribute on Earth" by Rolling Stone Magazine, and will be playing Saturday, June 11 at Choate Rosemary Hall Grounds.  Visit www.1964thetribute.com to learn more about the band.

Tickets are $35.00 and the concert will be held Rain or Shine.  (If there is poor weather they may move it inside.)  Since the concert is scheduled outside it is recommended you bring your own chairs or blankets to enjoy.

You should purchase your own tickets by contacting the Quinnipiac Chamber at 203-269-9891 or 203-234-0332 or e-mail qcc@quinncham.com .  You can also attempt to use the flier posted in the event (if it uploads correctly.).

Richard suggests you arrive by 6 pm to join him for some good seats.  He will try to set aside an area when he gets there, and will bring balloons to help others find him.  2 other meet-up groups have been invited, so there should be a number of people to mingle with.

You can bring your own Food and Drink and have a picnic, or there will be some Food and Drinks available for Sale.

Richard will Host this Meetup and can be reached at rjlopresti@aol.com or 203-623-0536.

For this Event, if you're only a "Maybe" please post that in your RSVP text.
item.how_to_find_us: Richard will be using some Balloons to be more visible.
item.name: "Beatles Bash" Concert
